app_brief: This is the battle of your life are you ready? One great game with cool graphics and gameplay.
tutor_0_2_start: Lets combine some troops to attack!
tutor_1_2_start: Lets combine some troops to attack!
tutor_0_4_start: It is your last tutorial, do you're best!
tutor_1_4_start: Pass the end line to win!
tutor_end: Good Job! Its time to attend online battle and gain rewards in trophy road
tutor_slot_description: After each victory you will be awarded with a book.
tutor_slot_open: Now click on the book to open it!
tutor_cards_0: You can earn cards, coins and gems.
tutor_cards_2: Now let's strengthen our forces with the cards we found!
tutor_challenge_210: It seems you ready for new challenge!
tutor_challenge_220: It seems you ready for new challenge!
tutor_challenge_230: It seems you ready for new challenge!
tutor_quest_0:
OK!
 Now, you can do your first mission!
tutor_buddy_0: Did you know that for every person you invite to play, you receive # and your friend receives # gems? Also you can fight with them!
improve_locked_meaagse: You have not found the card yet.
invite_friend_label: “Boomland” is an online battle game! I play in Boomland with '#' name. If you install the game through this link you will be earn rewards in the game.
invite_friend_message: Hi, If you want to fight me in BoomLand game, tap on the link below. Hey, If you didn't install the game yet,you will earn free gem while tapping on the link.
try_to_league_up:
locked!!!
more win to unlock it.
error_-7: Should Wait more! seek for them in books
leave_operation_confirm_message: Do you want to start over?
card_message_101: The most accurate shooter. he can target a flying insect too
card_message_102: Firooz the superman. spite of his huge body, his heart act like an angel
card_message_103: Dwarves reach to a worthy knowledge, they do cooperative
card_message_104: Khan is the guy who attack,defense and kick their enemy's ass just by one shot
card_message_105: Firooz's son ignores his baldness, he just focus on turning into a superman, as his father
card_message_106: The Grenadier, wow he only fight with tossing grenades, he must be such a brave guy!
card_message_107: Tanks always will be tanks,supply fear, rage and enormous fire
card_message_108: If you believe in your skills, you can do it with a cross-bow even
card_message_109: once he was hurt by an injury, then he decide to become a healer to help his comrades
card_message_110: The dwarfs go battle together,they understand the power of team work, and do great things.
card_message_111: Khan is the man of war, a defender, a warrior, will destroy numbers of enemy with just one bullet
card_message_112: Iranian soldiers will attack in groups, they are a bit slow but fatal
card_message_151: Use the falling bomb well-timed, it can turns battle's result
card_message_152: Snipers are waiting for your command to shoot the enemies
card_message_153: The cold can stun your opponent, though it has short time effect short but you have to take use of it
card_message_201: more powerful citadel, more chance to winning a war obviously
arena_up: Good job! Welcome to the league!
arena_motivation: Try to re-enter your previous league.
arena_down: No way! You have returned to this league again!
earn_at_chests: Can be found in gold and legendary books.
exchange_free_skip: Did you know you can forward time by the magic of gems?
exchange_hint_104: Collect # stars until open the book.
quest_message_0: Earn experience by upgrading cards and done the missions
quest_message_1: Winning on-line battles qualified you to the next league
quest_message_2: Get the points of mission by winning the operations
quest_message_3: Doing operations rewarded with passing the missions
quest_message_4: Get points and gift by winning the on-line battles
quest_message_5: Accomplished this mission by friendly battle against your buddies and clan-mates
quest_message_6: Just participate in fast or free challenge
quest_message_7: Play more battles, cause it rewarded you with more books and cards also
quest_message_8: You need to get enough gold and coins to upgrade cards
quest_message_9: You will earn book by winning the battle and getting daily prize
quest_message_10: Support Us by rate game in market.
quest_message_11: On the Telegram channel, you will see rewards, news and discount tickets!
quest_message_12: On the Instagram page, you will see rewards, news and discount tickets!
quest_message_13: Invite your friends to both in invitation and friend's level-ups you earn rewards!
challenge_join_confirm: Did you know joining cost cheaper than guaranteed prize!

challenge_error_illigeal: Unfortunately campaign have started. wait until next campaign.
challenge_error_already: You already joined. wait for start campaign!
challenge_error_join_-1: You can not join now, wait until next campaign!
challenge_error_join_-3: Already registered. wait for start campaign!
challenge_info_0: This is the most common battle. You can play it without restriction
challenge_info_1: The winner of this battle is the one who pass the end line sooner. You need a ticket to enter!
challenge_info_2: The Masters will fight together, What a battle...
challenge_info_3: All your money is in the safe box in the middle, defend and try to protect it
tooltip_indicator_1: You gain XP by doing different activities and will level up!
tooltip_indicator_2: You gain trophies by winning battles. You will lose them if you are defeated.
tooltip_indicator_3: Coins are rewarded in on-line battles.
tooltip_indicator_4: You can collect gems from books or buy them from the shop.
tooltip_indicator_6: You can collect tickets from daily offers or buy them from the shop.

tooltip_exchange_10: Low on coins? You can convert your gems into coins from the shop.
tooltip_exchange_20: Amazing! These are offers brought to you personally. Do not miss them.
tooltip_exchange_70: Purchase tickets to be able to progress faster in challenges.
tooltip_exchange_100: There are so many free books. You just have to visit the game everyday.
tooltip_exchange_110: You will be award keys after each battle.
tooltip_exchange_120: Use some gems to see what amazing rewards are there inside these books.

notify_exchange_wait_forgot: Oh no! You have forgotten something. Can you guess what?

tip_0_0: Upgrade your cards and take challenges to reach higher levels.
tip_0_3: You will progress much faster by opening more books.
tip_0_5: Open more books to find special cards.
tip_0_6: Drop Bombs or arrows on group of troops it destroy them faster.
tip_0_9: You find cards by books. So fight more in battles to catch more books.
tip_1_0: With more wins you can enter higher leagues and collect stronger cards.
tip_1_1: You need enough gold and card for upgrading cards.
tip_1_3: Open more books to find special cards.
tip_1_5: You can invite your friends in any social network to the game.
tip_1_6: After inviting your friends both you and your friend will receive gems!
tip_1_7: Upgrade cards and do battles for reaching higher level.
tip_1_8: Watching video ads will grant you books and gems.
tip_1_9: Drop Bombs or arrows on group of troops it destroy them faster.
tip_2_1: You can invite your friends in any social network to the game.
tip_2_2: Upgrade cards and do battles for reaching higher level.
tip_2_5: Upgrade cards and do battles for reaching higher level.
tip_2_6: You find cards by books. So fight more in battles to catch more books.
tip_2_7: Drop Bombs or arrows on group of troops it destroy them faster.
